column4: nobody knows how to help me i take it... tell me to go away if you dont know so i dont bug... i get menus that stick on the screen and wont go away... its blocking my view.. should i post a pastebin link or something.. its never been more than one at a time.. it only has happened the last few days.
menues? or windows? you could try "xkill" in terminal and then klick on the window
